byline.original: By AL BAKER and RICK ROJAS

abstract: New York City police arrest ex-convict Jeremy Wilson on larceny and forgery charges; say Wilson impersonated wounded veteran and fraudulently leased BMW from Massachusetts dealership.
lead_paragraph: The police identified the man as Jeremy Wilson, and said they had arrested him after investigators concocted a story to draw Mr. Wilson to a station house in Chelsea.

headline.main: ​Man Posing as War Hero Charged With Fraud, Police Say
headline.print_headline: Fraud Case Leads to Man Said to Fake Being Veteran

snippet: The police identified the man as Jeremy Wilson, and said they had arrested him after investigators concocted a story to draw Mr. Wilson to a station house in Chelsea.
